scripts.install:all: npm --prefix src/api install && npm --prefix src/auth install && npm --prefix src/security install && npm --prefix src/echo install
scripts.build: npm --prefix src/api run build && npm --prefix src/auth run build && npm --prefix src/security run build && npm --prefix src/echo run build
scripts.test: npm --prefix src/api run test && npm --prefix src/auth run test && npm --prefix src/security run test && npm --prefix src/echo run test
scripts.bootstrap: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
